tool_description: Manages version control and change tracking for satellite subsystem configurations throughout the development lifecycle.

configuration_name.description: Name of the configuration to track

subsystem_ids.description: List of subsystem registry IDs in this configuration

change_description.description: Description of changes in this version

changed_by.description: Name of person making the change

approval_required.description: Whether this change requires formal approval

baseline_version.description: Whether this version should become the new baseline

release_notes.description: Additional release notes for this version

error_messages: Invalid configuration name: Configuration name cannot be empty
Empty subsystem list: Must provide at least one subsystem ID
Invalid version format: Version must follow X.Y.Z format with numeric values
Empty change description: Must provide description of changes
Invalid user name: Changed by field cannot be empty
Version already exists: This version number is already in use for this configuration
Subsystem not found: One or more subsystem IDs do not exist in registry
usage: Track configuration versions by providing configuration details and change information. Use incremental version numbers and clear change descriptions.

tracking_status.description: Version status: draft, pending_approval, approved, baseline

approval_status.description: Approval status if required: pending, approved, rejected
